details.description: Find a lost pension by contacting the Pension Tracing service online
details.more_information:
You need to give the Pension Tracing Service as much information as you can, including whether you're looking for a workplace pension or personal pension.

%If the Pension Tracing Service can find your pension, they'll give you the address of your scheme provider. It's up to you to make any further enquiries.%

You can also contact the Pension Tracing Service by phone or by post.

$C
**Pension Tracing Service**  

**Telephone:** 0845 6002 537  
**Telephone from abroad:** +44 (0)191 215 4491  
**Textphone:** 0845 3000 169  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm  
$C

$A
Pension Tracing Service
The Pension service
Tyneview Park
Whitley Road,
Newcastle Upon Tyne
NE98 1BA
$A
details.introduction: To find a lost pension contact the Pension Tracing Service online. Youâ€™ll be asked to fill out a form. This service is free.

details.description: Includes automatic enrolment, lost pensions and planning for retirement
Includes holidays and finding a job
Workplace pensions - what employers have to do, automatic enrolment, stakeholder pensions
The Pension Service helps with State Pension eligibility, claims and payments
